metadata.title: Leadership Roles
metadata.description: Executive committee leadership positions that guide our club to success

introduction.title: About Club Leadership
introduction.description: The executive committee provides the strategic direction and operational management of our club. These leadership roles offer invaluable experience in management, team coordination, and organizational leadership.

story.title: You Don't Need Experience to Lead
story.quote: Don't need to be an experienced Toastmaster to stand for roles. Just need curiosity, interest, time, and conviction.
story.narrative: At our December 2, 2025 meeting, Amr attended his 2nd meeting ever and was elected Vice President of Membership! He said: 'Public speaking is a skill that improves over time, not overnight. You have to come and keep improving.'
story.followup: Just weeks later, he's now leading our membership efforts and welcoming new guests to the club.
story.key_message: Leadership roles are about learning by doing, with full support from the committee.

featured_roles.title: Vice President of Membership
responsibilities: Welcome guests and potential members at club meetings
Coordinate guest visits and follow up with interested individuals
Monitor member participation and engagement levels
Organize member appreciation activities and recognition
Track membership renewals and assist with renewal process
Develop and implement membership recruitment strategies
featured_roles.ideal_for: Enjoy talking to people and making connections, have a friendly and welcoming personality, are interested in sales or customer service, want to help others succeed, and are organized and good at follow-up

featured_roles.title: Vice President of Public Relations
responsibilities: Create and schedule engaging social media posts
Manage club presence on Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, and other platforms
Write compelling posts about club meetings and member achievements
Create graphics, videos, and other visual content
Promote club events and activities to the local community
Build relationships with local media and organizations
featured_roles.ideal_for: Enjoy social media and online communication, have a creative mindset and eye for design, want to develop marketing skills, like writing and creating content, and are comfortable with technology

other_positions.title: President
other_positions.description: The chief executive officer of the club, responsible for overall club success, member satisfaction, and strategic direction.

other_positions.title: Vice President Education (VPE)
other_positions.description: Oversees all educational programs, schedules speakers, assigns meeting roles, and tracks member progress through Pathways.

other_positions.title: Secretary
other_positions.description: Maintains all club records, manages correspondence, and ensures compliance with Toastmasters International requirements.

other_positions.title: Treasurer
other_positions.description: Manages all club finances, collects dues, pays bills, and maintains accurate financial records.

other_positions.title: Sergeant at Arms (SAA)
other_positions.description: Ensures the meeting space is properly set up, manages club property and equipment, and creates a welcoming environment.

cta.title: Interested in Leadership?
cta.description: Club officer elections are held annually in May. Talk to current officers about running for a leadership position and how you can contribute to our club's success.
